Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Atria is a newly refurbished office building located within Bolton town centre and a short walk from the town centre amenities such as The Market Place shopping centre and the Bus / Rail stations. The building is accessed through a prominent entrance just off Spa Road and leads through to an impressive reception area, with manned reception, meeting rooms available to hire and break out area for the building.

Bolton is located approximately 14 miles north west of Manchester. Knowsley House is a prominent four storey building located on Knowsley Street in the heart of Bolton Town Centre. The accommodation is within easy reach of local bus and rail networks and has excellent regional road links as it is within 5 minutes’ drive to the A666 (St Peters Way) which leads to the M61 motorway. There has been a significant transformation of the retail area, including national retailers, quality public realm, open spaces, public squares, food and leisure facilities. Knowsley House is a centrally located, fully refurbished building, providing a range of suites, with attractive external façades and modern refurbished interior.

120 Bark Street is a new development located within the heart of Bolton town centre. The building is situated near Bolton’s primary retail and business core with good communications by both road and rail. Manchester International Airport is 21 miles from 120 Bark Street which provides direct access to over 200 world-wide destinations. 120 Bark Street is within walking distance of Bolton’s main amenities, including numerous bars, restaurants, retailing centre and is within 5 minutes drive of the regional motorway network which provides access to M61, M60, M62, M56 via the A666 (St Peter’s Way). 120 Bark Street has been designed by award winning architects, Aedas and provides exceptional office accommodation in Bolton town centre. The building offers Grade A accommodation arranged over eight floors. 120 Bark Street is a modern, contemporary office building with unique design features in Bolton’s business district. The materials used create a beautifully finished corporate environment and glazing to all elevations floods the building with daylight. Underground parking available at a ratio of 1:2514 sq ft with further spaces available at the local NCP.
